extends java.lang.Object

subtractPath

public Path subtractPath(Path path)
Subtracts a path from this path. First the method checks whether this path starts with the path to be subtracted. Then the beginning of this part which matches the given path is cut of and the rest is being returned, e.g. /a/b/c/d - /a/b = /c/d. Returns null, if this path does not start with the given path.

Parameters:
path - the path to be subtracted from this path
Returns:
the orinal path minus the given path

Returns:
true if this path starts with the given path
